Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.8 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 17.4 with a standard deviation 2. The z-score of the person with 12.8 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -3.56
* -3.54
* -2.3

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.56: Incorrect
* 3.54: Incorrect
-2.3: Correct
